channel.title: Even on 常玄的个人博客
channel.description: Recent content in Even on 常玄的个人博客

item.title: We Have Lost Even
item.description: We Have Lost Even We have lost even this twilight. No one saw us this evening hand in hand, while the blue night dropped out of the world. I have seen from my window, the fiesta of sunset in the distant mountain tops. Sometimes a piece of sunburned like a coin between my hands. I remembered you with my soul clenchedin the sadness of mine that you know. Where were you then?
